Class CommentDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.chmut.giftit.dao.impl.CommentDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommentDao, Dao<java.lang.Long,Comment>

    public class CommentDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommentDao
    The Comment dao class provides manipulation of Comment entity with database.
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.
